original_title: ครีมเกิร์ล
overview: Cream is a bot model “Cream Girl”, purchased by K in order to be his sex companion and ease his feelings from recently getting dumped by his ex-girlfriend. Cream has only been programmed with lust and is curious about the concept of love. She secretly reprograms herself by installing a love emotion app which is normally forbidden for “Cream Girls”.
title: Cream Girl
